divs: Sighting Detailsyou may call me so I can explain it better. will take any test to prove to you that this did happen.one person was with me in the car .we felt very strong feeling of being watched please call.I can tell you more.I work at corning hospital.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Elmira
There was one other sighting in Elmira on or around July 19th 1964
Summary: first one ,waverly hill object came down on top of car instantly.two ,two bright white objects were about 100 ft from my window over a telephone pole.
